Name: The Castle Disaster
About the game: Take the role of leader in battle against darkness. You have to locate locks in such a sequence to defeat the army of darkness and destroy their shacks and locks. It is not a simple fight ahead. Are you ready for it? - Good graphics - Uncomplicated gameplay - Easy operation
